I don't know what apple calls it , You can setup VNC server on Mac. And access from anywhere,from your mobile too.

Or if you mean like using mouse, keyboard then i would prefer KDE connect.

Anybody know how to make find my useful?

I left my phone in the car when i went for a walk and took my airpods with me. I was expecting my watch to notify me that I had left my phone behind but it didn't. When I got back in the car there was a notification on the phone saying I had left my airpods behind.

Why didn't my watch notify me. A quick googling says I have all the setting properly adjusted. It should work but it doesn't.

Also like why does it wait 15 minutes before it tells me I left something behind. I can be halfway to town by the time I get notified. Just let me know as soon as you lose connection or let me set it the ping frequency FFS.
